__e: Just got to find a temporary new home and three new balls.
All right, fine, but it better be temporary, and then it's just you and me.
But these flowers are just temporary and not just because they're mostly dead.
It's vulnerable, impermanent... but stronger than you know... and more valuable than you can imagine.
Oscar was dead, and you needed something to trade for your girlfriend in the box, so you tinkered around with it and found a temporary solution, but, hey, good on you.
We've lived here for 12 years and for 12 years we've been saying it's temporary, but it's not.
